      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGameResultToStatsPage(HangManGameData completedGame)
      This method adds the data from the completedGame argument to the stats page, as well as loading all the newly computed stats for all the games played.

      This method lets us add a guess to the game page display without having to rebuild the entire page.
      void clearGamePage()
      When a new game starts the game page should not have a subheader or display guesses or a win state, so all of that has to be cleared out of the DOM at that time.

      Accessor method for initializing the game doc, which displays while the game is being played and displays the guesses.

        public java.lang.String oldGuessMatch

    • Constructor Detail

      • HangManDocumentManager

        public HangManDocumentManager(HangManUI initUI)

    • Method Detail

      • setGameDoc

        public void setGameDoc(javax.swing.text.html.HTMLDocument initGameDoc)
        Accessor method for initializing the game doc, which displays while the game is being played and displays the guesses. Note that this must be done before this object can be used.
        Parameters:
        initGameDoc - The game document to be displayed while the game is being played.

      • setStatsDoc

        public void setStatsDoc(javax.swing.text.html.HTMLDocument initStatsDoc)
        Accessor method for initializing the stats doc, which displays past game results and statistics. Note that this must be done before this object can be used.
        Parameters:
        initStatsDoc - The stats document to be displayed on the stats screen.

      • addGuessToGamePage

        public void addGuessToGamePage(java.lang.String guess,
                               java.lang.String newGuessMatch)
        This method lets us add a guess to the game page display without having to rebuild the entire page. We just add it to the HTML list of guesses made so far this game.
        Parameters:
        guess - Guess letter .
        newGuessMatch - The so-far-guessed word,with correct letters and underlines .

      • clearGamePage

        public void clearGamePage()
        When a new game starts the game page should not have a subheader or display guesses or a win state, so all of that has to be cleared out of the DOM at that time. This method does the work of clearing out these nodes.

      • addGameResultToStatsPage

        public void addGameResultToStatsPage(HangManGameData completedGame)
        This method adds the data from the completedGame argument to the stats page, as well as loading all the newly computed stats for all the games played.
        Parameters:
        completedGame - Game whose summary will be added to the stats page.
